header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Senior Cloud Engineer with 6+ years developing scalable cloud infrastructure, data platforms, and distributed systems. Proven expertise in AWS services (Kinesis, DynamoDB, S3, IAM), Infrastructure-as-Code, CI/CD pipelines, and container orchestration. Strong background in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and multi-cloud environments. AWS Cloud Practitioner certified with hands-on experience in cloud security and operational excellence.
